last_episode_to_air.name: My Assistant Who Helps Treat Love Cells
last_episode_to_air.overview: Having to choose between two different suitors, who will be Mu Yeong's final choice?

name: Oh! My Assistant
overview:
Seon Ho is an artist who draws adult webtoons. It started as an easy way to make money, but it’s caused some unexpected side effects: he hasn’t been aroused for over two years! Exhausted, he hires an assistant. It’s just that he didn’t expect him to be so cute! Mu Yeong is clean, talented, and apparently loaded, so... why does he want to work under Seon Ho?

Turns out, Mu Yeong is Seon Ho’s number one fan...

episodes.name: 19-Rated comic author chooses a pretty boy to be his assistant
episodes.overview: Comic author Seon Heo wants to find an assistant, but during the interview process he unexpectedly finds one of the candidates very tempting!

episodes.name: Impression becomes trembling feeling, trembling feeling becomes misunderstanding
episodes.overview: Mu Yeong starts working as an assistant at Seon Heo's house, and one of the tasks seems to be posing as a reference model for Seon Heo?

episodes.name: Don't Draw Nudes While Drinking
episodes.overview: Seon Heo and Mu Yeong drink together after work. Drinking through the night, Seon Heo suddenly asks to draw Mu Yeong naked?

episodes.name: Act Like Nothing Happened After That Kiss
episodes.overview: Both Seon Heo and Mu Yeong have become distressed following their accidental kiss that one night. How will the two of them resolve their embarrassment?

episodes.name: Friendship Time Before the Kiss
episodes.overview: One day, Seon Heo and Mu Yeong go outside to work together, but in an unexpected twist, Mu Yeong sees Seon Heo and an editor going to a hotel together.

episodes.name: Confess Even If We Will Never Meet Again
episodes.overview: Seon Heo gathers his resolve to tell Mu Yeong how he really feels, but Mu Yeong doesn't accept his confession of love.

episodes.name: I'll Come After Showering, Don't Go Back
episodes.overview: Mu Yeong goes to Seon Heo's house to pack up his things, but Seon Heo has something he suddenly wants to tell Mu Yeong.

episodes.name: My Assistant Who Helps Treat Love Cells
episodes.overview: Having to choose between two different suitors, who will be Mu Yeong's final choice?
